import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Batch create custom field entity mappings"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/custom-fields/entity-mappings/batch"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates multiple custom field entity mappings in a single request. Each mapping defines how data flows from a source entity's custom field to a target entity's field. Returns the created mappings with their generated IDs.

**Workflow:**
1. Call GET /entity-mappings/entity-types to discover available entities and fields
2. Optionally call POST /compatible-fields to verify field compatibility
3. Submit batch request with array of mapping definitions
4. Receive created mappings with assigned IDs
5. Mappings take effect immediately for relevant entity operations

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"Array of entity mapping requests for batch creation. Allows creating multiple entity mappings in a single API call.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request to create or update an entity mapping. Defines how data should flow from a source entity's custom field to a target entity's field.","required":["SourceEntityTypeId","SourceCustomFieldTypeId","TargetEntityTypeId","SourceEntityId","TargetEntityId"],"properties":{"CustomFieldEntityMappingId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of existing mapping to update. Omit when creating a new mapping.","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"},"SourceEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity type UUID of the source entity.","example":"d7bda5de-e6a2-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getCustomFieldEntityMappingEntityTypes","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/entity-mappings/entity-types","responseField":"Items[].EntityType.EntityTypeId"}},"SourceCustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Custom field type UUID on the source entity to map from.","example":"e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089"},"TargetEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Entity type UUID of the target entity.","example":"f3a1b2c3-d4e5-6789-0abc-def123456789","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getCustomFieldEntityMappingEntityTypes","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields/entity-mappings/entity-types","responseField":"Items[].EntityType.EntityTypeId"}},"TargetCustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Custom field type UUID on the target entity. Required if mapping to a custom field (mutually exclusive with TargetCustomDatabaseField).","example":"f4e5d6c7-b8a9-4102-a3b4-c5d6e7f89012"},"TargetCustomDatabaseField":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Database field name on the target entity. Required if mapping to a standard field (mutually exclusive with TargetCustomFieldTypeId).","example":"LocationId"},"SourceEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the specific source entity record (e.g., specific AssetId, TicketId).","example":"546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3"},"TargetEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the specific target entity record.","example":"622760c9-8ba3-f011-8e61-6045bd85293b"}},"example":{"SourceEntityTypeId":"d7bda5de-e6a2-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","SourceCustomFieldTypeId":"e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089","TargetEntityTypeId":"f3a1b2c3-d4e5-6789-0abc-def123456789","TargetCustomFieldTypeId":"f4e5d6c7-b8a9-4102-a3b4-c5d6e7f89012","SourceEntityId":"546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3","TargetEntityId":"622760c9-8ba3-f011-8e61-6045bd85293b"},"title":"CustomFieldEntityMappingRequest"},"example":[{"SourceEntityTypeId":"d7bda5de-e6a2-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","SourceCustomFieldTypeId":"e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089","TargetEntityTypeId":"f3a1b2c3-d4e5-6789-0abc-def123456789","TargetCustomFieldTypeId":"f4e5d6c7-b8a9-4102-a3b4-c5d6e7f89012","SourceEntityId":"546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3","TargetEntityId":"622760c9-8ba3-f011-8e61-6045bd85293b"}],"title":"BatchCustomFieldEntityMappingRequest"},"example":[{"SourceEntityTypeId":"d7bda5de-e6a2-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","SourceCustomFieldTypeId":"e7c8b30d-d899-4193-a70b-21994d2a8089","TargetEntityTypeId":"f3a1b2c3-d4e5-6789-0abc-def123456789","TargetCustomFieldTypeId":"f4e5d6c7-b8a9-4102-a3b4-c5d6e7f89012","SourceEntityId":"546f841c-32d8-47e5-bfc1-a4f21754d6d3","TargetEntityId":"622760c9-8ba3-f011-8e61-6045bd85293b"}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
